subject: Economy
topic: The Transformation from NITI Aayog to Niti Aayog
question_en: What is the primary objective of Niti Aayog after its establishment?
question_hi: नियमित अधिकांति के प्रस्तुति के लिए नई निदेश नियमित अधिकांति के प्रस्तुति के लिए नई निदेश नियमित अधिकांति के लिए नई निदेश नियमित अधिकांति

A_en: The main objective of NITI Aayog for establishing a new policy framework (नई निदेशन नियमित अधिकांति)

question_en: What role did NITI Aayog play in the formation of the Rajasthan State Planning Commission?

options_en.value: NITI Aayog played a key role in promoting economic development in Rajasthan.
